briefdescription.para: Creates a new file system based on a @root path.

parameterdescription.para: String path where file system will be virtually mounted

simplesect.para: A handle to file system if success, null otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Add a file into the file system.

parameterdescription.para: A handle to the file system
Absolute path to the file

simplesect.para: Returns zero on success, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Add a directory into the file system.

parameterdescription.para: A handle to the file system
Absolute path to the directory

simplesect.para: Returns zero on success, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Add a file into the file system.

parameterdescription.para: A handle to the file system
Absolute path to the file

simplesect.para: Returns zero on success, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Remove a directory from the file system.

parameterdescription.para: A handle to the file system
Absolute path to the directory

simplesect.para: Returns zero on success, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: List all files contained in a file system.

parameterdescription.para: A handle to the file system
Vector containing all files inside the file system

simplesect.para: Returns zero on success, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: List all files contained in a file system sorted by extension.

parameterdescription.para: A handle to the file system
Set containing vectors of files sorted by extension

simplesect.para: Returns zero on success, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: List all directories contained in a file system.

parameterdescription.para: A handle to the file system
Vector containing all directories inside the file system

simplesect.para: Returns zero on success, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Generates the cannonical path of a file.

parameterdescription.para: A handle to the file system
Pointer reference to the file to be cannonicalized
Vector of strings containing the cannonical path

simplesect.para: Returns zero on success, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Generates the cannonical path of a directory.

parameterdescription.para: A handle to the file system
Pointer reference to the directory to be cannonicalized
Vector of strings containing the cannonical path

simplesect.para: Returns zero on success, different from zero otherwhise

parameterdescription.para: Handle referencing the file system
